questions.text: Is there a Board-approved Information Security Policy?
questions.help_text: Policy should be approved at Board level and reviewed annually.

questions.text: Has a Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) been appointed?
questions.help_text: CISO should report directly to senior management.

questions.text: Is an Information Security Risk Assessment conducted annually?
questions.help_text: Assessment should cover all critical assets and systems.

questions.text: Are identified risks documented in a Risk Register?
questions.help_text: Risk register should include risk treatment plans.

questions.text: Are data centers protected by physical access controls?
questions.help_text: Controls include biometric access, CCTV, and security personnel.

questions.text: Are environmental controls (fire, temperature, humidity) in place?
questions.help_text: Includes fire suppression systems and environmental monitoring.

questions.text: Are critical systems protected by network segregation?
questions.help_text: Production, development, and DMZ networks should be segregated.

questions.text: Is antivirus software deployed across all endpoints?
questions.help_text: Antivirus definitions should be updated daily.

questions.text: Are daily backups taken for critical data?
questions.help_text: Backups should be stored at an offsite location.

questions.text: Are disaster recovery drills conducted at least annually?
questions.help_text: Drills should test full recovery of critical systems.
